tool_description: Generate highly realistic HTTP referers for web scraping or testing purposes.
name: 🔴 REFERER 🔴 Daddy
title: 🔴 REFERER 🔴 Daddy

api_list.name: Fetch a realistic HTTP referrer.
api_list.description:
Functionality
The /getReferer endpoint generates a realistic HTTP referrer URL based on a variety of real-world scenarios. This includes mimicking search engines, social media platforms, and other common referrer patterns.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://referer-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/getReferer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "referer-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://referer-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/getReferer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "referer-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
